title: "Could not connect to the HTTP server.
body:
What's going on? I'm using a fresh install of League. It was working perfectly not 2 Hours ago and now it's decided to stop working all of a sudden.
Any help would be appreciated. Here's a pic of what i see when i try to launch it when i run normally and when i run as Administrator.

http://i.imgur.com/8fRgxoM.jpg

{{champion:32}}

replies.body: I got the same problem with you for over one week.....i just going crazy, and i fund some solution that never work! who can solve this problem!!!
My friend is having the same problem. He's gone through firewall settings and its not helping at all. PLEASE RIOT HELP US FIX THIS.
